com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization
Class VirtualizedSystemClassLoader

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.ClassLoader
      java.security.SecureClassLoader
          java.net.URLClassLoader
              com.oracle.tools.runtime.java.virtualization.VirtualizedSystemClassLoader
Direct Known Subclasses:
VirtualizationClassLoader
public class VirtualizedSystemClassLoader
extends URLClassLoader

A VirtualizedSystemClassLoader is a URLClassLoader that defines a VirtualizedSystem, that of which is used to encapsulate and isolate System-level resources for classes loaded with the said ClassLoader.

This class is primarily used by the Virtualization class to locate, redirect and delegate requests to System resources (by loaded classes) to the VirtualizedSystem resources.

Copyright (c) 2011. All Rights Reserved. Oracle Corporation.
Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its affiliates.

Author:
Brian Oliver, Jonathan Knight

Initially the Properties collection for the ClassLoader will be empty.

VirtualizedSystemClassLoader

public VirtualizedSystemClassLoader(ClassLoader parent,
                                    VirtualizedSystem system)
Constructs a VirtualizedSystemClassLoader with the specified parent ClassLoader.

Initially the Properties collection for the ClassLoader will be empty.

Parameters:
parent - the parent ClassLoader

VirtualizedSystemClassLoader

public VirtualizedSystemClassLoader(URL[] urls,
                                    ClassLoader parent,
                                    VirtualizedSystem system)
Constructs a VirtualizedSystemClassLoader with the specified parent ClassLoader. Classes defined by the specified URLs will be loaded by this ClassLoader and not delegated to the parent.

Initially the Properties collection for the ClassLoader will be empty.

Parameters:
urls - the URLs to be loaded by this ClassLoader
parent - the parent ClassLoader

the VirtualizedSystem
